section.p: The tengu king tells you about a man calling himself Tatsu. ‘I trained him in the secret art of Oak Limb boxing, which made him invincible to attack on all points of his body except the top of his head.’
He laughs a long dry creaking laugh. ‘It would take too many years. But I will show you the rudiments of the art.’
Permanently increase your unwounded Stamina score by 1-6 points (the roll of one die). Then .
